about_the_game:
Take a step and distance yourself from reality! Wraithborn is a unique action game offering a breathtaking VR experience in a magical world. You will find yourself inside a grand dungeon and embark on an adrenaline-filled adventure as you explore rooms, each with a different concept.

Wraithborn is equipped with stunning graphics and impressive game mechanics of Unreal Engine 5. As you wander between rooms, you will be equipped with a wide selection of weapons and magic to fight against the enemies you encounter. Swords, arrows, magical staffs, and more... Various weapons and abilities are available, offering players unlimited combinations and play styles.

You will need to use your quick reflexes and strategic thinking skills when facing your enemies. Various enemy types and colossal boss characters waiting in the rooms will turn every moment into an exciting battle. Block attacks, use your armor, and defeat your enemies with lethal combos.

In this enchanting world, you will transform into a true hero as you explore rooms, each offering a unique atmosphere. Wraithborn's VR technology will offer an immersive experience. Touch the world around you, use your weapons with realistic movements, and experience a sensation unlike any you've felt before in reality.

Are you ready? Step into Wraithborn and start your journey to heroism. Explore the treasures deep in the dungeon, defeat your enemies, and become a true Wraithborn by fighting with legendary boss characters!

content_descriptors.notes: We fight and defeat the monsters that appear in the game.

name: Wraithborn

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5, 3rd gen (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i5, 7th gen (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 970 / AMD Radeon 290
